Class Sender

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Sender

  • public class Sender
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for sending packets to client.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void sendToAll(java.lang.Object message)
      Sends object to every clients connected with server.
      protected void sendToClient(java.io.ObjectOutputStream client, java.lang.Object object)
      Sends object to given client, specified by client argument.
      protected void sendToUsersInRoom(java.lang.String room, java.lang.Object message)
      Sends object to every clients connected with given room, specified with room argument.
